title: Are Allergies in Your Genes?
author: WebMD Editorial Contributors

content: Not exactly. If you have allergies , that doesn’t mean your child will for sure have them. But there is a 50-50 shot. If your spouse is also allergic, your kids’ odds go up to 75%.
Still, experts think other factors come into play, like your environment, air pollution, respiratory infections -- even diet and emotions.
